::Dragonfly/Darkfate::

Drgonfly used his com-link and talked with daarkfate while he was 
under attack "Master we have a problem that It's name is Alliance"

"Open fire, idiot" Shouted Darkfate "I'll arrive soon with 
Blacknightmare's squade and probe will arrive before"

"Yes master" answered Dragonfly shaking now he was in jaws and 
added"Ladies and gletemen... FIRE THE ALLIANCE MENBERS"


And he opened fire against the bot that was attaking at Kitkat, while 
the others spreaded attaking at Alliance, all of them Flying



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Vehement received Dark One's transmission, but didn't reply.  He 
didn't know 
> how too.  He then received Dragonfly's transmission, and acted his 
comm. 
> unit, sending a reply to Dragonfly.
> 
> "Vehement hear, leader of the base.  I can't talk right now, a 
battle is 
> about to start." 
> 
> The Brotherhood leader began taking steps backward towards the 
access hatch 
> of his base, fingers working over his forearm computer, Sun Crusher 
and 
> Reflector soon alerted of the situation brewing.
